title: SignalStore for State Management
summary: Adopted NgRx SignalStore for signal-first reactive state management with minimal boilerplate, entity management features, and seamless RxJS integration via rxMethod().

title: Mock Auth with Strategy Pattern
summary: Implemented Strategy pattern for authentication with MockAuthStrategy as default provider, demonstrating SOLID principles and enabling easy swap to real auth providers (OAuth2, SAML).

title: Component Library Architecture
summary: Built custom component library with 30+ standalone components using signal inputs, BEM CSS methodology, OnPush change detection, and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

title: Theming System Design
summary: Implemented CSS custom properties theming with six named themes (light, dark, and high-contrast variants), system preference detection, and runtime theme switching without JavaScript overhead.

title: Error Handling Strategy
summary: Created defense-in-depth error handling with global ErrorHandler for uncaught exceptions, HTTP interceptor for API errors, normalized AppError interface, and ErrorNotificationService for user feedback.
